title: Sampler, 1805
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation
inscribed: Wrote this when I was 12 years old AD 1805  Ann Mason was born in Sept the 23
provenance:
By 1981, Gertrude M. Oppenheimer
1981, Cooper-Hewitt Museum
description:
Bands of alphabets and numerals, in varied sizes and colors, and an inscription:  
Wrote this when I was 12 years old AD 1805  Ann Mason was born in Sept the 23

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1805.
1805. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-144.
